quote: We have come to a turning point in the road. If we turn to the right mayhap our children and our children's children will go that way; but if we turn to the left, generations yet unborn will curse our names for having been unfaithful to God and to His Word.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: The yogi offers his labyrinthine human longings to a monotheistic bonfire dedicated to the unparalleled God. This is indeed the true yogic fire ceremony, in which all past and present desires are fuel consumed by love divine.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Where lipstick is concerned, the important thing is not color, but to accept God's final word on where your lips end.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: When trouble comes, focus on God's ability to care for you.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: Every day people are straying away from the church and going back to God.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: God employs several translators; some pieces are translated by age, some by sickness, some by war, some by justice.
author: John Donne

quote: Laughter kills fear, and without fear there can be no faith. For without fear of the devil there is no need for God.
author: Sean Connery

quote: Retire at various times into the solitude of your own heart, even while outwardly engaged in discussions or transactions with others, and talk to God.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Now I can do no more. We must trust to the Great Disposer of all events and the justice of our cause. I thank God for this opportunity of doing my duty.
author: Horatio Nelson

quote: If God wanted us to fly, He would have given us tickets.
author: Mel Brooks

quote: Knowledge of God's Word is a bulwark against deception, temptation, accusation, even persecution.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: I have learned so much from God that I can no longer call myself a Christian, a Hindu, a Muslim, a Buddhist, a Jew.
author: Hafez

quote: We are all racing towards death. No matter how many great, intellectual conclusions we draw during our lives, we know they're all only man-made, like God. I begin to wonder where it all leads. What can you do, except do what you can do as best you know how.
author: John Hurt

quote: It's fun being a princess, but it's not very practical! You're trudging through the forest and the mud and all of the elements. You kind of think, 'How did they do this back then?' Thank God I can put on my Nike trainers and walk around the rest of the day!
author: Sarah Gadon

quote: I did nothing to deserve God's love; in fact, I was living as an orphan, without hope. Yet God chose to pursue a relationship with me, and through the death of his son Jesus, I was adopted into God's family.
author: Steven Curtis Chapman

quote: If you are going to sin, sin against God, not the bureaucracy. God will forgive you but the bureaucracy won't.
author: Hyman Rickover

quote: Freedom prospers when religion is vibrant and the rule of law under God is acknowledged.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Not only does God play dice, but... he sometimes throws them where they cannot be seen.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: When God sneezed, I didn't know what to say.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: Our faith is stronger than death, our philosophy is firmer than flesh, and the spread of the Kingdom of God upon the earth is more sublime and more compelling.
author: Dorothy Day

quote: Our English language really says if you're not a theist, the only alternative is to be an atheist. What I'm trying to do is develop a language that will enable us to talk about God beyond the, what I think, are sterile categories of theism and atheism.
author: John Shelby Spong

quote: I would like to be remembered as a - somebody who could rock your soul or make your cry with a song. And somebody who's kind, who loved to laugh, and loved his God.
author: Gregg Allman

quote: God's purpose in creation was to let us prove ourselves. The plan was explained to us in the spirit world before we were born. We were valiant enough there to qualify for the opportunity to choose against temptation here to prepare for eternal life, the greatest of all the gifts of God.
author: Henry B. Eyring

quote: I'm a survivor of life. I try to give the glory to God and appreciate what's happening to me.
author: Mike Epps

quote: God sometimes does try to the uttermost those whom he wishes to bless.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: But at any rate, the point is that God is what nobody admits to being, and everybody really is.
author: Alan Watts

quote: God spoke to you by so many voices but you would not hear.
author: James Joyce

quote: God, who knows our most secret thoughts and who sees all, is witness to the purity of my principles. They are not founded on this barbarous ferocity that takes pleasure in shedding human blood.
author: Toussaint Louverture

quote: Every creature is a word of God.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: Whenever they sang a certain song in church, I used to sing it the loudest: 'Lead me, guide me, along the way!' One day, as I was singing this song, I felt as if the Lord was saying to me, 'Lead you along what way?' I realized then that if you don't have a plan, God doesn't have anything specific to direct you in.
author: Myles Munroe

quote: As human beings, we are endowed with freedom of choice, and we cannot shuffle off our responsibility upon the shoulders of God or nature. We must shoulder it ourselves. It is our responsibility.
author: Arnold J. Toynbee

quote: Golf... is the infallible test. The man who can go into a patch of rough alone, with the knowledge that only God is watching him, and play his ball where it lies, is the man who will serve you faithfully and well.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: Don't look for obscure formulas or mystery in my work. It is pure joy that I offer you. Look at my sculptures until you see them. Those closest to God have seen them.
author: Constantin Brancusi

quote: Laughter is God's blessing.
author: Joseph Prince

quote: God made the world round so we would never be able to see too far down the road.
author: Isak Dinesen

quote: Those who are faithful to God are protected and prospered. That comes as the result of serving God and keeping His commandments. But with those blessings comes the temptation to forget their source. It is easy to begin to feel the blessings were granted not by a loving God on whom we depend but by our own powers.
author: Henry B. Eyring

quote: Giving thanks is that: making the canyon of pain into a megaphone to proclaim the ultimate goodness of God when Satan and all the world would sneer at us to recant.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: When men don't fear God, they give themselves to evil.
author: Ray Comfort

quote: The limitless loving devotion to God, and the gift God makes of Himself to you, are the highest elevation of which the heart is capable; it is the highest degree of prayer. The souls that have reached this point are truly the heart of the Church.
author: Edith Stein

quote: The most important thing as a leader is your relationship with God.
author: Manny Pacquiao

quote: While I value the good opinion of my fellow citizens as highly as anyone, I may be permitted to say that I am governed by higher considerations than either the favor or the fear of man. I am impelled to the course I have taken because I fear God.
author: Elijah Parish Lovejoy

quote: I really do believe that God is love, one of deep affection and grace and forgiveness and inspiration.
author: William P. Young

quote: God is best known in not knowing him.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: I found thee not, O Lord, without, because I erred in seeking thee without that wert within.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: God... a being whose only definition is that he is beyond man's power to conceive.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Human beings should be held accountable. Leave God alone. He has enough problems.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: God gave me life to continue to do things that I would never have done.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: When we put God first, all other things fall into their proper place or drop out of our lives.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: Satan has declared war on motherhood. He knows that those who rock the cradle can rock his earthly empire. And he knows that without righteous mothers loving and leading the next generation, the Kingdom of God will fail.
author: Sheri L. Dew

quote: Some of God's greatest gifts are unanswered prayers.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: I discovered who I was when I discovered God. You are just like your father God.
author: Myles Munroe

quote: Eighteen months before I was born, my mother was in Auschwitz. She weighed 49 pounds. She always told me that God saved her so she could give me life. I was born out of nothing.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Now the only way you can serve God on earth is by serving others.
author: Rick Warren

quote: All of us have a God in us, and that God is the spirit that unites all life, everything that is on this planet.
author: Wangari Maathai

quote: Many of the lessons we are to learn in mortality can only be received through the things we experience and sometimes suffer. And God expects and trusts us to face temporary mortal adversity with His help so we can learn what we need to learn and ultimately become what we are to become in eternity.
author: David A. Bednar

quote: We Marines believe that God gave America the greatest gift He could bestow to man while he lived on this earth -freedom. We also believe He gave us another gift nearly as precious - our soldiers, sailors, airmen, Coast Guardsmen, and Marines - to safeguard that gift and guarantee no force on this earth can ever steal it away.
author: John F. Kelly

quote: God may not be there when you want him but he is always on time.
author: Terrell Owens

quote: I will do my best. That is all I can do. I ask for your help - and God's.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: God has entrusted me with myself.
author: Epictetus

quote: I didn't get interested in music. It was a gift from God.
author: Nina Simone

quote: Jail didn't make me find God, He's always been there. They can lock me up, but my spirit and my love can never be confined to prison walls.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: As for restitutions, to nobody in particular do I owe any, but as for those I owe to the realm, I hope in the mercy of God.
author: Louis XIV

quote: Who kills a man kills a reasonable creature, God's image, but thee who destroys a good book, kills reason its self.
author: John Milton

quote: Marrying for love may be a bit risky, but it is so honest that God can't help but smile on it.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Man must feel the earth to know himself and recognize his values... God made life simple. It is man who complicates it.
author: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Before me, even as behind, God is, and all is well.
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: Although believers by nature, are far from God, and children of wrath, even as others, yet it is amazing to think how nigh they are brought to him again by the blood of Jesus Christ.
author: George Whitefield

quote: Each one of us is an outlet to God and an inlet to God.
author: Ernest Holmes

quote: What I see in the Bible, especially in the book of Psalms, which is a book of gratitude for the created world, is a recognition that all good things on Earth are God's, every good gift is from above. They are good if we recognize where they came from and if we treat them the way the Designer intended them to be treated.
author: Philip Yancey

quote: A thick skin is a gift from God.
author: Konrad Adenauer

quote: Too many Christians live their lives like slaves - to the devil - because they believe his lies more than they trust God.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: He was a wise man who originated the idea of God.
author: Euripides

quote: In all ranks of life the human heart yearns for the beautiful; and the beautiful things that God makes are his gift to all alike.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: There is no work, however vile or sordid, that does not glisten before God.
author: John Calvin

quote: I always had a desire to know asylum life more thoroughly - a desire to be convinced that the most helpless of God's creatures, the insane, were cared for kindly and properly.
author: Nellie Bly

quote: Cause I was such a novice and thank God that Sarah was as seasoned as she was because she was really a great leader in that regard in the sense that she would communicate really well with the crew.
author: Charisma Carpenter

quote: How many precious things do we not already possess which others have not - have hardly an idea of! Let us enjoy these, then, and bless God that we are permitted to enjoy them, rather than importune His goodness with vain longings for more.
author: Jane Welsh Carlyle

quote: God is the tangential point between zero and infinity.
author: Alfred Jarry

quote: Though everything else may appear shallow and repulsive, even the smallest task in music is so absorbing, and carries us so far away from town, country, earth, and all worldly things, that it is truly a blessed gift of God.
author: Felix Mendelssohn

quote: There's only one effectively redemptive sacrifice, the sacrifice of self-will to make room for the knowledge of God.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Memory that yearns to join the centre, a limb remembering the body from which it has been severed, like those bamboo thighs of the god.
author: Derek Walcott

quote: When it is a question of God's almighty Spirit, never say, 'I can't.'
author: Oswald Chambers

quote: God has been faithful time and again to surround me with people that sharpen me and that make me better.
author: TobyMac

quote: The hardest people to reach with the love of God are not the bad people. They know they are bad. They have no defense. The hardest ones to win for God are the self-righteous people.
author: Charles L. Allen

quote: Praise God, from whom all blessings flow! Praise Him, all creatures here below! Praise Him above, ye heavenly host! Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost!
author: Thomas Ken

quote: God is, even though the whole world deny him. Truth stands, even if there be no public support. It is self-sustained.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The only thing that matters is submitting to the will of God.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Complaining is dangerous business. It can damage or even destroy your relationship with God, your relationships with other people, and even with your relationship with yourself.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Reason is God's crowning gift to man.
author: Sophocles

quote: It is only the impossible that is possible for God. He has given over the possible to the mechanics of matter and the autonomy of his creatures.
author: Simone Weil

quote: Young man, young man, your arm's too short to box with God.
author: James Weldon Johnson

quote: If you must be mad, be it not for the things of the world. Be mad with the love of God.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: God gets you to the plate, but once your there your on your own.
author: Ted Williams

quote: For it pleased God, after he had made all things by the word of his power, to create man after his own image.
author: George Whitefield

quote: Nothing that is God's is obtainable by money.
author: Tertullian

quote: Even God lends a hand to honest boldness.
author: Menander

quote: To lovers of the truth, nothing can be put before God and hope in Him.
author: Saint Basil

quote: The world sees in our conduct, in our behaviour, the proof that we are the real children of God.
author: Pope Shenouda III

quote: My walk on the moon lasted three days. My walk with God will last forever.
author: Charles Duke

quote: God, from a beautiful necessity, is Love.
author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quote: What ever disunites man from God, also disunites man from man.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: After all, God is God because he remembers.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: God is a verb, not a noun.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Since God knows our future, our personalities, and our capacity to listen, He isn't ever going to say more to us than we can deal with at the moment.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: There is nothing unpremeditated, nothing neglected by God. His unsleeping eye beholds all things.
author: Saint Basil

quote: At the cross God wrapped his heart in flesh and blood and let it be nailed to the cross for our redemption.
author: E. Stanley Jones

quote: People see God every day, they just don't recognize him.
author: Pearl Bailey

quote: God the Father and God the Son cannot be everywhere present; indeed they cannot be even in two places at the same instant: but God the Holy Spirit is omnipresent - it extends through all space, with all other matter.
author: Orson Pratt

quote: But I know God has big stuff planned that ultimately doesn't have anything to do with me.
author: Michael W. Smith

quote: Cast your cares on God; that anchor holds.
author: Frank Moore Colby

quote: There is no place in my soul, no corner of my character, where God is not.
author: Evelyn Underhill

quote: Material possessions, winning scores, and great reputations are meaningless in the eyes of the Lord, because He knows what we really are and that is all that matters.
author: John Wooden

quote: My message is that God is a good God.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Whatever comes from God is impossible for a man to turn back.
author: Herodotus

quote: In myself I am nothing. It all comes from God and the Virgin Mary.
author: Lech Walesa

quote: I've said all along that God is in control.
author: Tony Dungy

quote: Sometimes you ask God for something and you don't know what you're asking.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: I think that anything that begins to give people a sense of their own worth and dignity is God.
author: John Shelby Spong

quote: God, I can push the grass apart and lay my finger on Thy heart.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: God sent Jesus as an example to see if we could retain and maintain the Holy Spirit in human flesh.
author: Benny Hinn

quote: Nobody talks so constantly about God as those who insist that there is no God.
author: Heywood Broun

quote: God is not a cosmic bellboy for whom we can press a button to get things.
author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: The Bible is a revelation of the mind and will of God to men. Therein we may learn, what God is.
author: Jupiter Hammon

quote: Each atom of the Holy Spirit is intelligent, and like all other matter has solidity, form, and size, and occupies space.
author: Orson Pratt

quote: God is one, greatest of gods and men, not like mortals in body or thought.
author: Xenophanes

quote: Before we can know God and understand his great plan it is first necessary for us to believe that he exists and that he rewards all who diligently seek him.
author: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

quote: God in His wisdom has decided that He will reward no works but His own.
author: Johannes Tauler

quote: We are made to know and love God.
author: Nicolas Malebranche

quote: Adoration is caring for God above all else.
author: Evelyn Underhill

quote: They always win who side with God.
author: Frederick William Faber

quote: God is creating at every moment of the world's existence in and through the perpetually endowed creativity of the very stuff of the world.
author: Arthur Peacocke
